overview: Ariane's grandmother often visits her in her dreams. Together, they wander through unknown nocturnal landscapes. In this dreamlike short film, where the border between memories and imagination is blurry, Ariane raises the possibility that the seal between life and death is more porous than we think.
tagline: "In this dreamlike tribute to her grandmother, Ariane raises the possibility that the seal between life and death is more porous than we think. "
title: See You in My Dreams
